snippet: Mitt Romney provoked the biggest laughs of the night by seeming mystified why Mr. Stephanopolous kept pressing him to answer whether he thought the Supreme Court should allow states to ban contraception.
abstract: Mitt Romney provoked the biggest laughs of the night by seeming mystified why Mr. Stephanopolous kept pressing him to answer whether he thought the Supreme Court should allow states to ban contraception.

headline.main: Debate Fact Check: Romney on Contraception and Personhood
